actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that the Small Business Administration shall, in assisting small business concerns in the sale of materials and services to the Federal Government, give special preferences to small business concerns with one hundred or fewer employees.

summary.text: Mini-Business Opportunity Act of 1979 - Amends the Small Business Act to require the Small Business Administration to give special preference, to the maximum extent practicable, to small business concerns with 100 or fewer full-time employees in arranging for the performance of government subcontracts and in obtaining opportunities to participate in procurement and service contracts with the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that the Small Business Administration shall, in assisting small business concerns in the sale of materials and services to the Federal Government, give special preferences to small business concerns with one hundred or fewer employees.
